title: And... It's Good!
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Hey football fans, ever heard of the Chicago Bears Principle? How about Winter Magic? Or the UFL? In this Super Bowl-themed episode, Redditors educate us on the stats, the halftime history books, and tackle football on wheels.

media:content.media:description: Keith Burchall of Woonsocket, Rhode Island, was excited to attend the rally as he dressed in Patriots colors and with his face painted silver. (Jesse Costa/WBUR)
